Class ResourceSparseApplyAdagradV2

java.lang.Object
org.tensorflow.op.RawOp
org.tensorflow.op.train.ResourceSparseApplyAdagradV2
All Implemented Interfaces:
Op
@Operator(group="train") public final class ResourceSparseApplyAdagradV2 extends RawOp
Update relevant entries in '*var' and '*accum' according to the adagrad scheme. That is for rows we have grad for, we update var and accum as follows: accum += grad * grad var -= lr * grad * (1 / sqrt(accum))

    • create

      @Endpoint(describeByClass=true) public static <T extends TType> ResourceSparseApplyAdagradV2 create(Scope scope, Operand<? extends TType> var, Operand<? extends TType> accum, Operand<T> lr, Operand<T> epsilon, Operand<T> grad, Operand<? extends TNumber> indices, ResourceSparseApplyAdagradV2.Options... options)
      Factory method to create a class wrapping a new ResourceSparseApplyAdagradV2 operation.
      Type Parameters:
      T - data type for ResourceSparseApplyAdagradV2 output and operands
      Parameters:
      scope - current scope
      var - Should be from a Variable().
      accum - Should be from a Variable().
      lr - Learning rate. Must be a scalar.
      epsilon - Constant factor. Must be a scalar.
      grad - The gradient.
      indices - A vector of indices into the first dimension of var and accum.
      options - carries optional attribute values
      Returns:
      a new instance of ResourceSparseApplyAdagradV2

    • useLocking

      public static ResourceSparseApplyAdagradV2.Options useLocking(Boolean useLocking)
      Sets the useLocking option.
      Parameters:
      useLocking - If True, updating of the var and accum tensors will be protected by a lock; otherwise the behavior is undefined, but may exhibit less contention.
      Returns:
      this Options instance.
